title: Open House
itunes:title: Open House
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Written by: Megan McDuffee

***

Narrated by: Megan McDuffee, Owen McCuen, Jimmy Ferrer

***

Bonus Episode: "My girlfriend and I were chased by a satanic cult in the Appalachia mountains of West Virginia" written by RandomGuySpeaks

***

Find our reward tiers and how to get your bonus magnet at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Sound Design by Pacific Obadiah

***

Title music by Alex Aldea



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
